Class Asset

java.lang.Object
LogicBusiness.Asset
public class Asset extends Object
Represents an asset with its details, including name, type, purchase information, quantity, and goals associated with it.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Asset(String Name, String Type, String purchaseTime, int Quantity, int PurchasePrice)
    Constructor to create a new asset with the specified details.

    • Asset

      public Asset(String Name, String Type, String purchaseTime, int Quantity, int PurchasePrice)
      Constructor to create a new asset with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      Name - The name of the asset.
      Type - The type of the asset.
      purchaseTime - The time when the asset was purchased.
      Quantity - The quantity of the asset.
      PurchasePrice - The purchase price of the asset.

    • equals

      public boolean equals(Object obj)
      Compares this asset to another object for equality. Two assets are considered equal if they have the same name, purchase time, type, and quantity.
      Overrides:
      equals in class Object
      Parameters:
      obj - The object to compare this asset with.
      Returns:
      true if the assets are equal, false otherwise.
